author: rhuijben
msg: (repos_to_repos_copy): To resolve issue #3374, uri-decode the repository
url before passing parts from it to the ra layer as local paths.

author: hwright
msg: WC-NG: Fix the last of the failures in basic_tests, by implementing the
keep-local flag for working nodes.  This flag should be temporary, since
it's only use is due to the need to keep a directory scheduled for deletion
around until it's committed.  Once we centralize the metadata, we should be
able to lose that behavior and this flag.
(statements): Add keep_local column to work_node statements.
(read_entries): Set the keep_local value in the entry.
(write_entry): Set the keep local value in the working node.

author: rhuijben
msg: (try_copy): Following up on 36103, remove struct as svn_client__copy_pair_t

author: rhuijben
msg: (try_copy): Provide the actual type of the elements to sizeof.
